a small cup; classifier for lamps

heisig_chinese_memo: I get bored doing the dishes so I take small cups and pretend they are little boats floating in the sea.
Ru_trainchinese:
zhǎn: (сч.слово) счетное слово для лампы или фонаря
zhǎn: (графема) маленькая чашка
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The small cup which is your only bathroom dish ends up floating in the bath tub when you children play with it in the bath.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from the " dish ", the sound of " pull " is a vessel for holding food. The gold inscription means food utensils, and the prince Shenzhangai: "Prince Shenzha (made) Jiayou Zhanzhu." " Zhan " variants are " 𥂫 " and "醆", "Guangya. "Shi Qi": "𥂫, 盂 Ye." "Yu Pian": "䀂 𥂫, big 盂 Ye." (Refer to Rong Geng)

" Zhan " means a wine cup, "Guang Ya": "Yu, Jue Ye." Wang Niansun, "Guang Ya Shuzheng": "Je is the glutinous rice, the cup is the Zhan, Yi Ye." "Book of Rites. "Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs" Zheng Xuan's Note: "Mixie, Liquor."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from the " dish ", the sound of " pull " is a vessel for holding food.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「皿」，「戔」聲，是盛食物的器皿。金文表示食器，王子申盞蓋：「王子申乍(作)嘉嬭盞盂。」「盞」異體作「𥂫」、「醆」，《廣雅．釋器》：「𥂫，盂也。」《玉篇》：「䀂𥂫，大盂也。」(參容庚)

　　「盞」後世表示酒杯，《廣雅》：「斝，爵也。」王念孫《廣雅疏證》：「爵謂之醆，杯謂之盞，一也。」《禮記．郊特牲》鄭玄注：「醆，酒盎。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「皿」，「戔」聲，是盛食物的器皿。

金文從「 皿 」，「 戔 」聲，是盛食物的器皿。金文表示食器，王子申盞蓋：「王子申乍(作)嘉嬭盞盂。」「 盞 」異體作「 𥂫 」、「 醆 」，《廣雅．釋器》：「𥂫，盂也。」《玉篇》：「䀂𥂫，大盂也。」(參容庚) 「 盞 」後世表示酒杯，《廣雅》：「斝，爵也。」王念孫《廣雅疏證》：「爵謂之醆，杯謂之盞，一也。」《禮記．郊特牲》鄭玄注：「醆，酒盎。」
Bronze inscription from the " dish", the sound of " pull" is a vessel for holding food. The gold inscription means food utensils, and the prince Shenzhangai: "Prince Shenzha (made) Jiayou Zhanzhu." " Zhan" variants are " 𥂫" and " 醆", "Guangya. "Shi Qi": "𥂫, 盂 Ye." "Yu Pian": "䀂 𥂫, big 盂 Ye." (Refer to Rong Geng) " Zhan" means a wine cup, "Guang Ya": "Yu, Jue Ye." Wang Niansun, "Guang Ya Shuzheng": "Je is the glutinous rice, the cup is the Zhan, Yi Ye." "Book of Rites. "Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs" Zheng Xuan's Note: "Mixie, Liquor."

盞字的基本解释

盞
zhǎn
见“盏”。

盞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》阻限切，上産，莊。］
亦作“1”。“盏1”的繁体字。
(1)浅而小的杯子。
(2)特指酱杯。
(3)酒、茶或灯的计量单位。

盞字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皿字部】　盞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页795第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?阻限切，音醆。【博雅】杯也。【揚子·方言】趙魏之閒或曰盞。【註】酒盞，最小杯也。　又叶知輦切，音展。【歐陽修·送劉原甫詩】魚枕蕉一舉，十分當覆盞。䑕鬚管爲物，雖微意不淺。　又【說文】本作琖。重文作盞。【廣韻】通作?。【集韻】亦作?。

盞字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
盞字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" restricts cutting, high production, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "1". The traditional characters of "Zhan 1 ".
(1) Shallow and small cups.
(2) Especially the sauce cup.
(3) The unit of measurement for wine, tea or lamps.
